citations.narrative:
The facility is not following the Program of Vet Care (PVC) for parasite prevention. The 10 (ten) adult wolf-dog hybrids
have not been administered any ectoparasite prevention according to the facility representative but have been
administered blood and intestinal parasite prevention medication. The current PVC prescribes for ectoparasite prevention
as "credelio p.o. monthly spring through fall". The Attending Veterinarian clarified that "spring through fall" covers the
months of April to October. The wolf-dog hybrids have missed ectoparasite prevention for April and May of this year.
Failure to follow the PVC for preventative care and screening can leave the dogs susceptible to diseases or parasites,
which, if contracted, would cause pain, distress, and suffering. Correct by administering all of the preventative care for
parasite control, in accordance with a schedule approved by the Attending Veterinarian.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3)  Repeat
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility is not following the Program of Vet Care (PVC) for parasite prevention. The 10 (ten) adult wolf-dog hybrids 
have not been administered any ectoparasite prevention according to the facility representative but have been 
administered blood and intestinal parasite prevention medication. The current PVC prescribes for ectoparasite prevention 
as "credelio p.o. monthly spring through fall". The Attending Veterinarian clarified that "spring through fall" covers the 
months of April to October. The wolf-dog hybrids have missed ectoparasite prevention for April and May of this year. 
Failure to follow the PVC for preventative care and screening can leave the dogs susceptible to diseases or parasites, 
which, if contracted, would cause pain, distress, and suffering. Correct by administering all of the preventative care for 
parasite control, in accordance with a schedule approved by the Attending Veterinarian. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
